pageContext.claim: “Catch and release. You catch them, you take a name, they don't have an address, you take a name, and then you release them into our country -- in some cases, to do tremendous harm.”
pageContext.analysis: Those with crime records are not eligible for catch and release, which is geared mostly at women and children seeking asylum. Justice Department statistics show that the vast majority of migrants attend their court hearings after being released into the country.
